title: Anthony Albanese - Wikipedia
snippet: In February 2024, Albanese announced his engagement to Haydon after proposing to her at The Lodge in Canberra. On 29 November 2025, Albanese and Haydon were married in a private ceremony at The Lodge. Albanese is the first prime minister of Australia to be engaged or wed while in office.

title: Jodie Haydon - Wikipedia
snippet: Jodie Haydon (born 1978 or 1979) is an Australian financial services professional and women's advocate. She is the wife of the 31st (and current) prime minister of Australia, Anthony Albanese. Jodie Haydon was born in 1978 or 1979 in Bankstown, Sydney, and grew up on the Central Coast of New ...

title: Spouse or partner of the prime minister of Australia - Wikipedia
snippet: The spouse of prime minister Anthony Albanese is Jodie Haydon.

title: Australian prime minister Albanese becomes first to wed in office
snippet: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has married his partner Jodie Haydon, becoming the country's first leader to tie the knot while in office.

title: Australian prime minister, Anthony Albanese, marries partner Jodie Haydon | Anthony Albanese | The Guardian
snippet: The Australian prime minister, Anthony Albanese, has married his partner, Jodie Haydon, in Canberra, making him the first Australian leader to tie the knot in office.
